text: Fantomas contra los vampiros multinacionales is a comic book by Julio Cortázar published in 1975. The book mimics film noir-style comic book stories with speculative fiction to expound the evils of multinational corporations. It was inspired in part by the Mexican comic adaptations of Fantômas, a popular arch- villain from French crime fiction. Category:1975 novels Category:Works by Julio Cortázar Category:Spanish graphic novels Category:Fantômas
title: Fantomas contra los vampiros multinacionales
